com.team23.weather.gui

Class HourlyForecastItemPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.team23.weather.gui.HourlyForecastItemPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

     class HourlyForecastItemPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A HourlyForecastItemPanel extends JPanel. A HourlyForecastItemPanel displays information about the weather from a Forecast to the user. This includes the date of the forecast, the minimum and maximum Temperature's, and the sky condition. A HourlyForecastItemPanel updates through the HourlyForecastPanel
    Author:
    Tim
    See Also:
    OwmClient, Forecast, WeatherData, JPanel, HourlyForecastPanel
